name: Reading Chinese: Global Perspectives
description: Designed for students who are able to read everyday publications, e.g., newspapers in either complex-form characters or simple-form characters. Pinyin, complex-simplified character conversion and vice versa, and fluency are emphasized through reading and discussing advanced materials in a variety of topics from global perspectives, presentations, and essay writing. This course may be taken before or after LGGC64H3.
exclusions: (LGGB67H3); The instructor has the authority to exclude students whose level of proficiency is unsuitable for the course.
